unnormalised: Fyi, "Hav." mhollear Havildar, Bhartiya Senecho unch podvi naslolo odhikari. Hav. chya voir, tumkam "Naik" ani uprant "Lance Naik" mellta tumkam odhikari podvi mellche adim. "Capt." mhollear Captain, odhikari ani "Maj. Gen." mhollear Major General, ek unch podvi aslolo odhikari. Yaad dovrat ki "Wg. Cdr." mhollear Bhartiya Havaidalantlo Wing Commander, Senentlea Lieutenant Colonel-ak saman. Tech bhaxen, kednaim kednaim lok "Brigadier"-ak "Brig." mhonn uktairat, dekhun bhonvrum naka. Hi sankshipt roopam sadharanponnan sarkari kagadpatram ani akasmit uktevonnent vaportat, dekhun tim zanna zaunchem borem!
normalised: Tumchea mahitekhatir, "Havildar" mhunnttlear Havildar, Bharoti Soinyantlo ek non-commissioned officer. Havildaracher, "Naik" ani magir "Lance Naik" aasa ani magir commissioned ranks yetat. "Captain" mhunnttlear Captain, ek commissioned officer, ani "Major General" mhunnttlear Major General, ek khup unch podvi aslolo officer. Yaad dovrat ki "Wing Commander" mhunnttlear Bharoti Havaidalantlo Wing Commander, jo Soinyantle Lieutenant Colonelachea soman aasa. Tannem "Brigadier" haka kadinch "Brigadier" oxem kortat, dekhun bhonvon naka. Heo sankshipt rupadhikarik kagodpatrant ani nemalle varta-vinyasantlyan vaprotat, dekhun tankam zanno asop borem!
text: Fyi, "Hav." mhollear Havildar, Bhartiya Senecho unch podvi naslolo odhikari. Hav. chya voir, tumkam "Naik" ani uprant "Lance Naik" mellta tumkam odhikari podvi mellche adim. "Capt." mhollear Captain, odhikari ani "Maj. Gen." mhollear Major General, ek unch podvi aslolo odhikari. Yaad dovrat ki "Wg. Cdr." mhollear Bhartiya Havaidalantlo Wing Commander, Senentlea Lieutenant Colonel-ak saman. Tech bhaxen, kednaim kednaim lok "Brigadier"-ak "Brig." mhonn uktairat, dekhun bhonvrum naka. Hi sankshipt roopam sadharanponnan sarkari kagadpatram ani akasmit uktevonnent vaportat, dekhun tim zanna zaunchem borem!
